Subject: Securing the Web Console
Description: Trying to secure the web console for reports and AIC, but after changing the binding URL to HTTPS and specific port # in both config files, the ports are not available/listening after restarting the services.
What_We_Know__c: Customer was requesting assistance replacing certificate for HTTPS.
Solution_Comment__c:
Issue:
After securing the web console, the web servers do not bind to their appropriate ports.


Resolution:
Changed the ports being used by the applications and bindings started working as expected.
